app_descript:
PlantNet Plant Identification

Brief: PlantNet Plant Identification is a comprehensive tool designed for nature enthusiasts and professionals alike, aiming to help in identifying various plant species. This free mobile application encourages participation in a global citizen science project, focused on creating an extensive botanical database. If you've ever stumbled upon an intriguing plant and wondered about its identity, PlantNet can unravel the mystery with a simple photo.
